paragraph: I discovered programming back in 2008 when I decided to create a website for my World of Warcraft guild. This was the start of a series of projects that my friends and I built during our teens (Including a fast paced iOS/Android side-scroller that took our High-School my storm and earned us a full-page article in the local paper.

Since 2018 I have been working as a consultant focused on Intelligent Automation. I have lead process-discovery workshops, analyzed and documented business processes and developed robust automation solutions saving businisses tens of thousands of hours in labor.
When I am not working you might find me reading, rewatching classic movies or camping with my wife and our chocolate labrador.
